Name: Special Handling Code
Notes: Code specifying special transportation handling instructions

Name: Shipment Status Code
Notes: Code indicating the status of a shipment

Name: Date
Remarks: B404 is the date of last reported status of cargo.

Name: Status Time
Notes: Time (HHMM) of last reported status of cargo

Name: Status Location
Notes: Air shipment: Airport code for last reported status for a shipment; (Note: If the shipment is in-flight, the status location is the origin airport for this flight) Ground transportation: Code of carrier's terminal

Name: Equipment Initial
Notes: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number
Remarks: P0708: If either B4-07 or B4-08 is present, then the other is required

Name: Equipment Number
Notes: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Name: Location Identifier
Notes: Code which identifies a specific location
Remarks: P1112: If either B4-11 or B4-12 is present, then the other is required

Name: Equipment Number Check Digit
Notes: Number which designates the check digit applied to a piece of equipment
